name: To the Moon and Back (Pines Fugue)
name_original: To the Moon and Back (Pines Fugue)
description:
A short and cozy story about two lesbian werewolves. One of them hasn't transformed yet, but that's okay, her girlfriend has a cool potion.

Content warnings are in the story! Full screen highly recommended!

I really hope you enjoy this, it was a lot of fun to work on.
-Joanne (they/she)

We write as a hobby, not as a job, and fully believe that all art should be free to access. However, if you enjoyed our stories and have the ability to donate, we would greatly appreciate it.
